title: Blackadder: The Whole Damn Dynasty, 1485-1917
description: The complete scripts for one of British television's most hilarious comedies chronicles the zany misadventures of Edmund Blackadder and his hopelessly dimwitted companion Baldrick through four centuries of English history turned upside down, from the Elizabethan era to the First World War. Original. (Drama)
author: Richard Curtis
